/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++ CMakeFiles/armadillo_sim.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/armadillo_sim.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o armadillo_sim  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64 /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcusparse.so /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcusolver.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglut.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXi.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcusparse.so /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcusolver.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglut.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXi.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so -lpthread -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs" -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
